column1: • View photographs of the letters. Coming soon
• Learn more about Spenser's hands. Coming soon
• Read the General Transcription Policy for this edition of the letters.
• Read an introduction to this edition of the letters (includes bibliography).

column4: please consider participating in this collaborative editorial project. All contributions are archived in the Register of Contributions with full acknowledgment
column5: and the contributor's biographical information can be recorded in the Contributor Profiles. Those contributions added to the apparatus of the edition itself will likewise include full citations
column6: including name and contact information for the contributor.
